Verses: 1 needhimaan Madindhupogiraan, Oruvarum Adhai Manadhil Vaikkiradhillai; Buththimaangal Eduththukkollappadugiraargal, Aanaalum Theenguvaraadhadharkumunne Needhimaan Eduththukkollappadugiraan Enbadhai Sindhippaar Illai.
2 nermaiyaai Nadandhavargal Samaadhaanaththukkul Pravesiththu Thangal Padukkaigalil Ilaippaarugiraargal.
3 naalpaarkkiravalin Pillaigale, Vibasaaranukkum Vesikkum Pirandha Sandhadhiyaare, Neengal Inge Kittivaarungal.
4 neengal Yaaraip Pariyaasampannugireergal? Yaarukku Virodhamaai Vaayaith Thirandhu, Naakkai Neettugireergal? Neengal Dhrogampannugira Pillaigalum, Kalla Sandhadhiyaarumallavo?
5 neengal Pachchaiyaana Sagala Maraththinkeezhum, Vikkiraga Dhevargalode Mogaakkiniyil Vendhu, Pallaththaakkugalile Kanmalai Vedippugalin Keezhp Pillaigalaik Kondrupodugiravargal.

6 pallaththaakkugalilulla Vazhavazhappaana Silaigalidaththil Un Pangu Irukkiradhu; Avaigal, Avaigale Un Veedham; Avaigalukku Nee Paanapaliyai Vaarththu, Pojanapaliyaiyum Seluththugiraai; Ivaigalinmel Piriyappaduveno?
7 nee Uyaramum Unnadhamumaana Malaigalinmel Un Manjaththai Vaikkiraai; Angeyum Paliyidumpadi Erugiraai.

8 kadhavugalukkum Nilaigalukkum Pinnaaga Un Gnaabagakkuriyai Vaikkiraai; Nee Ennaivittuppoi Matravargalukku Unnai Velippaduththinaai; Erippoi Un Manjaththai Agalamaakki, Avargalode Udanpadikkaipanninaai; Avargaludaiya Manjaththaik Kaangira Ellaa Idaththilum Adhai Nesikkiraai.
9 nee Thailaththaip Poosikkondu Raajaavinidaththil Pogiraai; Un Parimalangalai Migudhiyaakki, Un Sthaanaapadhigalai Dhooraththukku Anuppi Unnaip Paadhaalamattum Thaazhththugiraai.
10 vazhidhooramaanadhaal Uzhandrupogiraai; Adhu Virudhaavendru Nee Sollugiradhillai; Un Kaibelaththaik Kandupidiththaai, Aagaiyaal Nee Aayaasappadavillai.

11 nee Yaarukku Anji Bayappadugiraai, Nee Poisollugiraaye; Nee Ennai Ninaiyaamalum, Un Manadhile Vaikkaamalum Pogiraai; Naan Vegukaalam Mavunamaayirundhen Allavaa? Aagaiyaal Enakku Bayappadaadhirukkiraai.
12 un Needhiyaiyum Un Kiriyaigalaiyum Naan Velippaduththuven Avaigal Unakku Udhavaadhu.

13 nee Kooppidumpodhu, Un Kanangal Unnaith Thappuvikkattum; Kaatru Avaigalaiyellaam Parakkadiththu Maayai Avaigalaik Kondupom; Ennai Nambiyirukkiravano Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththu, En Parisuththa Parvadhaththile Kaaniyaatchikkaaranaayiruppaan.
14 vazhiyai Uyarththi Uyarththi, Adhai Semmaippaduththi, Idaralgalai En Janaththin Vazhiyilirundhu Eduththuppodungal Ennappadum.

15 niththiyavaasiyum Parisuththar Engira Naamamullavarumaagiya Magaththuvamum Unnadhamumaanavar Sollugiraar: Unnadhaththilum Parisuththa Sthalaththilum Vaasampannugira Naan, Panindhavargalin Aaviyai Uyirppikkiradharkum, Norunginavargalin Irudhayaththai Uyirppikkiradharkum, Norungundu Panindha Aaviyullavargalidaththilum Vaasampannugiren.
16 naan Eppodhum Vazhakkaadamaatten; Naan Endraikkum Kobamaayiruppadhumillai; Enendraal, Aaviyum, Naan Undupannina Aaththumaakkalum, En Mugaththukku Munbaaga Sorndhupogume.
17 naan Avargal Porulaasaiyennum Akkiramaththinimiththam Kadunkobamaagi, Avargalai Adiththen; Naan Maraindhu, Kadunkobamaayirundhen, Thangal Manamponapokkile Maarubaadaai Nadandhaargale.
18 avargal Vazhigalai Naan Paarththu, Avargalai Gunamaakkuven; Avargalai Nadaththi, Thirumbavum Avargalukkum Avargalile Dhukkappadugiravargalukkum Aarudhal Alippen.
19 dhooramaayirukkiravargalukkum Sameebamaayirukkiravargalukkum Samaadhaanam Samaadhaanam Endru Koorum Udhadugalin Balanai Sirushtikkiren, Avargalaik Gunamaakkuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
20 dhunmaarkkaro Kondhalikkum Kadalaippolirukkiraargal; Adhu Amarndhirukkak Koodaamal, Adhin Jalangal Setraiyum Azhukkaiyum Karaiyil Odhukkugiradhu.
21 dhunmaarkkarukku Samaadhaanam Illaiyendru En Dhevan Sollugiraar.
